body_html:
CC @zdevito @jamesr66a

AT a wild guess, try applying this patch:

diff --git a/torch/csrc/jit/passes/shape_analysis.cpp b/torch/csrc/jit/passes/shape_analysis.cpp
index 7064e2b4b..0bf186f5b 100644
--- a/torch/csrc/jit/passes/shape_analysis.cpp
+++ b/torch/csrc/jit/passes/shape_analysis.cpp
@@ -146,7 +146,6 @@ bool isValidReturnForRunning(Value* v) {
 }
 
 OperatorSet cannot_propagate_shape_by_running_it = {
-  "aten::gesv(Tensor self, Tensor A) -> (Tensor, Tensor)",
   "aten::inverse(Tensor self) -> Tensor",
 };
